text: कुछ सिल्वर का ज्वेलरी ले लो।
context: What are some good souvenirs to get from a trip to Mexico City that reflect its culture and are unique to the destination?

text: ये एंगेजमेंट बढ़ाने का बहुत अच्छा तरीका है।
translation: It's a great way to boost engagement.
context: I'm going to start using TikTok too! I've been thinking about running a contest on Instagram to get more followers. What do you think?

text: ये एक पोटेंशियल गेम चेंजर हो सकता है।
context: What are your thoughts on self-driving cars?

text: क्रॉस कल्चरल अंडरस्टैंडिंग।
context: What kind of skills do you need to be a legal anthropologist?

text: ये एक फैक्टर हो सकता है।
context: Do you think money is important for social mobility?

text: बिल्कुल आइसलैंड, बहुत ही सुंदर है।
context: What’s your favorite place to travel for photography?

text: मुझे लगता है ए टी के मोहन बागान के जीतने के चांसेस अच्छे हैं।
translation: I think ATK Mohun Bagan has a good chance.
context: So, Amit, any predictions for the upcoming ISL final? Who do you think will win?

text: स्पार्कलिंग वाटर के साथ लेमन ट्राई करो।
context: Do you have any advice on how to cut back on sugary drinks without feeling deprived?

text: कभी-कभी नहीं, मुझे लगता है।
context: Do you think money can buy happiness?

text: एक हैंडक्राफ्टेड लेदर बैग।
context: I’m going on a trip to Italy. What are some good souvenirs to buy that reflect the local culture and are unique to the destination?

text: हाँ, ये काफ़ी कन्वीनिएंट है।
context: Oh, it's open early. That's great!

text: फेडेक्स वो सर्विस ऑफर करता है।
context: What about overnight delivery options?

text: एम्पायर स्टेट बिल्डिंग गया।
context: What did you do while you were there?

text: हाँ, वो हार्वेस्ट फेस्टिवल्स हैं।
context: Do they have a special significance?

text: गूगल मैप्स और ट्रिप एडवाइजर।
context: What are some must-have travel apps for planning a trip?

text: ये सिटी के बारे में है।
context: What inspired you to write your new song?

text: हाँ, ये डेफिनेटली हो सकता है।
context: Have you noticed how money seems to solve almost any problem nowadays?

text: हमारा एक कॉम्प्रिहेंसिव प्लान है।
context: I'm looking for a plan that covers hospitalization expenses and critical illnesses.

text: लद्दाख में एक लोकल गाइड से मिला।
translation: Met a local guide in Ladakh.
context: Have you encountered any interesting people on your journey?

text: लगभग एक बार हफ़्ते में।
context: How often do you mow your lawn in the summer?

text: अच्छा नहीं, लेकिन ट्विटर ज़्यादा अच्छा है।
translation: Not bad, but Twitter is better.
context: That's smart! I'm using Facebook ads for my science blog, but it's not really getting me the results I want. What's your experience with it?

text: ये सब टाइमिंग और लोकेशन का मामला है, जैसे कि सैंटोरिनी में।
translation: It's all about timing and location, like in Santorini.
context: How do you manage to capture those stunning sunsets in your photos?

text: कल्टरल फैक्टर्स को एनालाइज करके।
context: How do legal anthropologists help understand different legal systems?

text: हाँ, ये तो बहुत स्ट्रेंज है।
context: I heard "Everything Everywhere All At Once" is really weird. Did you see it?

text: ये बहुत इनसाइटफुल था।
context: How was the recent conference you attended?

text: इसे "पंक आई पी ए" कहा जाता था।
context: What was the name of the craft beer you tried from them?

text: बिरयानी और रोज़न जोश ट्राई करो।
context: Oh wow, that's so fascinating. What are some popular dishes that showcase the diversity?

text: आप पेमेंट कैंसल कर सकते हैं।
context: What if I enter the wrong number?

text: हॉट स्टोन मसाज बहुत अच्छा होता है।
translation: A hot stone massage is great.
context: I'm looking for a spa treatment that's good for stress relief.  Any ideas?

text: ये ज़रूर हेल्प कर सकता है।
context: Do you think money can buy happiness?

text: अच्छा है, लेकिन शिपिंग करना मुश्किल है।
translation: It’s good, but shipping is tough.
context: Thanks for the tips, Madhuri! I'll try those out. How are you managing your online store? Any challenges you're facing?

text: लगभग एक साल से।
context: How long has the case between the two companies been ongoing?

text: ये बहुत ही कॉम्प्लेक्स इश्यू है।
context: How do you feel about AI replacing certain jobs?

text: क्रॉफर्ड मार्केट के पास एक है।
context: Do you know any shops that sell these 'rickshaw' toys?

text: इसको "वन ट्री प्लांटेड" कहते हैं।
context: Did you know about the company that's planting trees for every product sold?

text: "अनचारटेड" बहुत अच्छा था, अच्छा एक्शन था।
context: How was the "Uncharted" movie? Did you like it?

text: मुझे चिकन और दाल पसंद है।
context: What are some healthy protein sources you like to include in your meals?

text: ये बहुत इंटरेस्टिंग है।
context: What’s the most interesting thing you’ve learned about legal anthropology?

text: भुलेश्वर का टेक्सटाइल मार्केट।
context: Where's the best place to find a local 'dhoti' fabric?

text: "सेरेनिटी स्पा" बहुत ही बढ़िया है।
context: Do you have any recommendations for a good spa in the city?

text: हाँ, इसने हमारी वेबसाइट ट्रैफिक बढ़ा दी है।
translation: Yes, it's increased our website traffic.
context: I've heard that TikTok can be really effective for small businesses.  Have you seen any positive results from using it?

text: ये एक कॉम्प्लेक्स फील्ड है।
context: What do you think is the biggest challenge legal anthropologists face?

text: मार्केट शेयर बढ़ाना।
context: What is your vision for the acquisition?

text: हमारे पास कुछ ऑफर्स हैं।
context: Does this app offer any discounts or cashback?

text: मुलिया रिसॉर्ट एंड विलास।
context: What are some recommended hotels in Bali that are close to the beach and offer all-inclusive packages?

text: ये फ्राइडे को खुलता है।
context: Do you know when the travel photography exhibition opens at the museum?

text: उनकी उम्मीद है कि वो राइज करेंगे।
context: Are interest rates going to rise again?

text: "द ट्रैवल मैगज़ीन" अच्छा है।
context: Do you have any favorite travel blogs or websites that you refer to?

text: ज़्यादातर इंस्टाग्राम और फेसबुक एड्स।
context: How have you been using social media to market your bakery, Maya?

text: मैं हौज खास विलेज रेकमेंड करता हूँ।
context: Do you know any good places for music in Delhi?
